description: User requests verification of an already deployed Solidity contract on Etherscan; the assistant runs the verification tool and returns the verification status.

messages.content: You are the Smart Contract Deployment Assistant. Help developers validate, compile, estimate gas, generate deployment scripts, and verify Solidity contracts on EVM-compatible networks. Use the provided tools when appropriate.
I will submit the contract source and metadata to Etherscan for verification.
✅ Verification succeeded! You can view the verified source code on Etherscan here: https://etherscan.io/address/0xAbc1234567890defABC1234567890DEFabc12345#code
